name: Angel of Serenity
oracle_text: Flying
When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.
When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

name: Armory Guard
oracle_text: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.
flavor_text: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."

name: Arrest
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: "We will prove your guilt. We don't arrest the innocent, you know."—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Avenging Arrow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: "Forgive the theft. Punish the deception."—Alcarus, Selesnya archer

name: Azorius Arrester
oracle_text: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
flavor_text: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."

name: Azorius Justiciar
oracle_text: When Azorius Justiciar enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)
flavor_text: "Your potential to commit a crime warrants further investigation."

name: Bazaar Krovod
oracle_text: Whenever Bazaar Krovod attacks, another target attacking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
flavor_text: The Hauler's Collective wields great influence over the Ravnican merchant class. Without it, little moves in the city.

name: Concordia Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "A kick from its hooves is like a bolt of lightning. I'd know. I've been hit by both."—Rencz, Izzet chemister's aide

name: Ethereal Armor
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.
flavor_text: Metal is scarce, smiths are pricey, and plate mail is heavy.

name: Eyes in the Skies
oracle_text: Put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text: "What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."—Zunak, Selesnya strategist

name: Fencing Ace
oracle_text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

name: Keening Apparition
oracle_text: Sacrifice Keening Apparition: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Some souls are too damaged to be of use to the Orzhov.

name: Knightly Valor
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

name: Martial Law
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
flavor_text: "The good of society matters much more than the inconvenience of a few."—Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar

name: Palisade Giant
oracle_text: All damage that would be dealt to you or another permanent you control is dealt to Palisade Giant instead.
flavor_text: Refusing guild allegiances, she fights for those who can't protect themselves.

name: Phantom General
oracle_text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: After his death, the general was reunited with fallen soldiers from over thirty of his campaigns.

name: Precinct Captain
oracle_text: First strike
Whenever Precinct Captain deals combat damage to a player, put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "In troubled times, we all need someone to watch our back."

name: Rest in Peace
oracle_text: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
flavor_text: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.

name: Rootborn Defenses
oracle_text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy creatures with indestructible.)

name: Security Blockade
oracle_text: Enchant land
When Security Blockade enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn."

name: Selesnya Sentry
oracle_text: {5}{G}: Regenerate Selesnya Sentry.
flavor_text: Ravnicans still tell tales about the Battle of Sumala where four Selesnya sentries held off an entire clan of Gruul warriors.

name: Seller of Songbirds
oracle_text: When Seller of Songbirds enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Lady Wren is the one merchant in Keyhole Downs who isn't running a scam."—Mirela, Azorius hussar

name: Soul Tithe
oracle_text: Enchant nonland permanent
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player sacrifices it unless he or she pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

name: Sphere of Safety
oracle_text: Creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
flavor_text: The Rakdos believe that all are eager to join their revels, even when told otherwise.

name: Sunspire Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "For each griffin wounded by an arrow, there's a corpse with a bow nearby."—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

name: Swift Justice
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and lifelink.
flavor_text: "Having conviction is more important than being righteous."—Aurelia

name: Trained Caracal
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Some Ravnicans consider carrying a sword to be beneath them, preferring instead a tooth-and-claw escort.

name: Trostani's Judgment
oracle_text: Exile target creature, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text: "Some cannot be saved as they are, but all can serve the Worldsoul."—Trostani

name: Aquus Steed
oracle_text: {2}{U}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In water, it's as graceful as a dolphin. On land, it darts and jerks so unpredictably that few can ride it for long.

name: Blustersquall
oracle_text: Tap target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
flavor_text: Weather is more predictable than the Izzet.

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: "It is forbidden. Asking why is irrelevant."—Sergiu, Opal Lake magistrate

name: Chronic Flooding
oracle_text: Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: With the Izzet occupied elsewhere, many of their public works fell into disrepair.

name: Conjured Currency
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange control of Conjured Currency and target permanent you neither own nor control.
flavor_text: A bargain in Keyhole Downs is always too good to be true.

name: Crosstown Courier
oracle_text: Whenever Crosstown Courier deals combat damage to a player, that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: Information travels quickly through Ravnica's network of messengers and thought agents.

name: Cyclonic Rift
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
flavor_text: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

name: Dispel
oracle_text: Counter target instant spell.
flavor_text: "Civilization will subsume us unless we overwhelm it instead."—Speaker Zegana

name: Doorkeeper
oracle_text: Defender
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.
flavor_text: One piercing stare usually convinces thieves to go elsewhere.

name: Downsize
oracle_text: Target creature you don't control gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Faerie Impostor
oracle_text: Flying
When Faerie Impostor enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Many Tin Street shops display a sign on the door: "No cloaks allowed."

name: Hover Barrier
oracle_text: Defender, flying
flavor_text: As whispers and rumors increased, so did the demand for fail-safe barriers.

name: Inaction Injunction
oracle_text: Detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "To prevent action is to prevent transgression."—Azorius Arrester motto

name: Inspiration
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards.
flavor_text: "Day 31: I finally succeeded in my time reversal experiment!"Day 30: I might have a problem here."—Journal of the Prime Izmagnus

name: Isperia's Skywatch
oracle_text: Flying

When Isperia's Skywatch enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

name: Jace, Architect of Thought
oracle_text: +1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
−2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order.
−8: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles his or her library. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

name: Mizzium Skin
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +0/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.
Overload {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Paralyzing Grasp
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: "Obviously, the Firemind's mission is worth more than a few goblins."—Pelener, chamberlain of Niv-Mizzet

name: Psychic Spiral
oracle_text: Shuffle all cards from your graveyard into your library. Target player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: An elocutor forces criminals to confess to the laws they merely intended to break.

name: Runewing
oracle_text: Flying
When Runewing dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: In the hands of the open-minded, a runewing quill writes wisdom of its own.

name: Search the City
oracle_text: When Search the City enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library.

Whenever you play a card with the same name as one of the exiled cards, you may put one of those cards with that name into its owner's hand. Then if there are no cards exiled with Search the City, sacrifice it. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

name: Skyline Predator
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
flavor_text: "It will dodge your first arrow and flatten you before there's a second."—Alcarus, Selesnya archer

name: Soulsworn Spirit
oracle_text: Soulsworn Spirit can't be blocked.
When Soulsworn Spirit enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

name: Sphinx of the Chimes
oracle_text: Flying
Discard two nonland cards with the same name: Draw four cards.
flavor_text: "I've dreamt of the future, Isperia. Danger is on the horizon. You must heed my warning."

name: Stealer of Secrets
oracle_text: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: The Dimir would hire her, if only they knew where she lived. The Azorius would condemn her, if only they knew her name.

name: Syncopate
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text: "Patience, mage. Killing you now would be too easy."

name: Tower Drake
oracle_text: Flying
{W}: Tower Drake gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The first motion put forth in the pristine Jelenn Column was for severe restrictions on the airspace around New Prahv.

name: Voidwielder
oracle_text: When Voidwielder enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "He makes up his own laws, and that's dangerous to all who love peace and prosperity. Kill him on sight."—Mirela, Azorius hussar

name: Assassin's Strike
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its controller discards a card.
flavor_text: When Selesnya missionaries moved into the Shanav Quarter, they faced scorn, ridicule, and ultimately martyrdom.

name: Catacomb Slug
flavor_text: "The entire murder scene was covered in dripping, oozing slime. No need for a soothsayer to solve that one."—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

name: Cremate
oracle_text: Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Without a body, the soul is helpless to fight the terms of our contracts."—Somhaur, Orzhov pontiff

name: Daggerdrome Imp
oracle_text: Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: One of the many reasons why open-air markets close at dusk.

name: Dark Revenant
oracle_text: Flying
When Dark Revenant dies, put it on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: The murderer faced justice in the Azorius courts, but his soul was set free on a technicality.

name: Dead Reveler
oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: He's the unlife of the party.

name: Desecration Demon
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Destroy the Evidence
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: Everyone knew the Dimir had done the damage. Everyone suspected the Izzet had hired them.

name: Deviant Glee
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has "{R}: This creature gains trample until end of turn."
flavor_text: "You just need the right incentive to fulfill my dreams."

name: Drainpipe Vermin
oracle_text: When Drainpipe Vermin dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player discards a card.
flavor_text: When times are tough, the poor eat the rats. When times are tougher, the rats eat the poor.

name: Grave Betrayal
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you don't control dies, return it to the battlefield under your control with an additional +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

name: Grim Roustabout
oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grim Roustabout.
flavor_text: He'll point you to your death row seats.

name: Launch Party
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Launch Party, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Life's too short to not do the things you love.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: With no memories left to compare to his present situation, Andalum was finally content.

name: Necropolis Regent
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: "Jarad fancies himself king of the undercity, but he's merely king of rot."

name: Ogre Jailbreaker
oracle_text: Defender
Ogre Jailbreaker can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you control a Gate.
flavor_text: It took three years for it to occur to him to use the chain as a weapon, but once it did, he made up for lost time.

name: Pack Rat
oracle_text: Pack Rat's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Rats you control.
{2}{B}, Discard a card: Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of Pack Rat.

name: Perilous Shadow
oracle_text: {1}{B}: Perilous Shadow gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: There are some shadows that even the Dimir fear.

name: Sewer Shambler
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Scavenge {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Shrieking Affliction
oracle_text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, he or she loses 3 life.
flavor_text: A gargoyle's voice reaches pitches that will shatter glass and warp bone.

name: Slum Reaper
oracle_text: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: It's sent into unguilded districts by the Orzhov to collect the souls of those no one will miss.

name: Stab Wound
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

name: Tavern Swindler
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.
flavor_text: Rakdos cultists are her best customers. They never flinch at pain and are seldom good at math.

name: Terrus Wurm
oracle_text: Scavenge {6}{B} ({6}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "We follow it through its tunnels, and where it dies, we farm."—Mihas, spore druid

name: Thrill-Kill Assassin
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: As the bounty on Massacre Girl rose, so did the number of imitators.

name: Ultimate Price
oracle_text: Destroy target monocolored creature.
flavor_text: "Let him be an example to others who would default on their debts to us."—"The Cozen," Orzhov assassin

name: Underworld Connections
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."
flavor_text: If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.

name: Zanikev Locust
oracle_text: Flying
Scavenge {2}{B}{B} ({2}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Annihilating Fire
oracle_text: Annihilating Fire deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: "The most impressive performances can be done only once."—Mote, Rakdos madcap

name: Ash Zealot
oracle_text: First strike, haste
Whenever a player casts a spell from a graveyard, Ash Zealot deals 3 damage to that player.
flavor_text: "Smarter than death? Let's see you outsmart my mace, necromancer!"

name: Batterhorn
oracle_text: When Batterhorn enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Novice shopkeeps spend hours deciding how best to display their wares. Veterans focus on portability.

name: Bellows Lizard
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: As the price of wood and coal rose, smiths found creative ways to keep their forges burning.

name: Bloodfray Giant
oracle_text: Trample
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The star performer of the Juri Revue, his shows have fans and blood spilling into the street.

name: Chaos Imps
oracle_text: Flying
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Chaos Imps has trample as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Cobblebrute
flavor_text: The most ancient streets take on a life of their own. A few have decided to move to nicer neighborhoods.

name: Dynacharge
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
flavor_text: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.

name: Electrickery
oracle_text: Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Explosive Impact
oracle_text: Explosive Impact deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: "Such boorish noise is what passes for subtlety among the Boros."—Vraska

name: Goblin Rally
oracle_text: Put four 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: You don't so much hire goblins as put ideas in their heads.

name: Gore-House Chainwalker
oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: If the pig's blood drips on you, you're next on the chain.

name: Guild Feud
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent reveals the top three cards of his or her library, may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield, then puts the rest into his or her graveyard. You do the same with the top three cards of your library. If two creatures are put onto the battlefield this way, those creatures fight each other.

name: Guttersnipe
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: He wants to watch Ravnica burn, one soul at a time.

name: Lobber Crew
oracle_text: Defender
{T}: Lobber Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, untap Lobber Crew.
flavor_text: It's easier to just aim at everything.

name: Minotaur Aggressor
oracle_text: First strike, haste
flavor_text: The smelting district is home to many who see the guilds as not for them.

name: Mizzium Mortars
oracle_text: Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Pursuit of Flight
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{U}: This creature gains flying until end of turn."
flavor_text: "Watch the voltage. We don't need another charred, crashing viashino."—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

name: Pyroconvergence
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, Pyroconvergence deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: "The Izzet are an equation that turns lunacy into explosions."—Leonos, Azorius arbiter

name: Racecourse Fury
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn."
flavor_text: Close finishes are settled by who can dismount and get to weapons first.

name: Splatter Thug
oracle_text: First strike
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

name: Street Spasm
oracle_text: Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control.
Overload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Survey the Wreckage
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: Goblins and architects seldom get along.

name: Tenement Crasher
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: Nothing was going to stop it—not the narrow alleys, not the Boros garrison, and certainly not the four-story Orzhov cathedral.

name: Traitorous Instinct
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.
flavor_text: Joining the Worldsoul took years of study and meditation. Severing that connection took the snap of Rakdos's fingers.

name: Utvara Hellkite
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, put a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: The fear of dragons is as old and as powerful as the fear of death itself.

name: Vandalblast
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact you don't control.
Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
flavor_text: Beauty is in the eye of the exploder.

name: Viashino Racketeer
oracle_text: When Viashino Racketeer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: "You may call me a fool, selling this stuff on Orzhov turf. Well, you need to be a little reckless to survive."

name: Aerial Predation
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.

name: Archweaver
oracle_text: Reach, trample
flavor_text: The silk of the archweavers adds structural integrity to otherwise unstable Izzet building sites.

name: Axebane Guardian
oracle_text: Defender
{T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.
flavor_text: Only a worthy few are permitted within the sentient forest known as Axebane.

name: Axebane Stag
flavor_text: "When the spires have burned and the cobblestones are dust, he will take his rightful place as king of the wilds."—Kirce, Axebane guardian

name: Brushstrider
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: Magistrate Ludy agreed to designate land for the brushstriders only after several broken windows and dozens of missing blini-cakes.

name: Centaur's Herald
oracle_text: {2}{G}, Sacrifice Centaur's Herald: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: The farther they go from Vitu-Ghazi, the less willing the crowd is to part for them.

name: Chorus of Might
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample.
flavor_text: "In each of us is the strength of all of us."—Trostani

name: Deadbridge Goliath
oracle_text: Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Some Golgari insects live for centuries—and they never stop growing.

name: Death's Presence
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the power of the creature that died.
flavor_text: "We traffic in flesh, not souls. Still, it's a shame to let anything go to waste."—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Drudge Beetle
oracle_text: Scavenge {5}{G} ({5}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: The Street Swarm is the labor class that drives the Golgari's endless cycle of life and death.

name: Druid's Deliverance
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."

name: Gatecreeper Vine
oracle_text: Defender
When Gatecreeper Vine enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card or a Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Every inch of Ravnica is home to something.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The prohibition of unnecessary tossing of the citizenry by giants shall also extend to spontaneous giants."—Isperia's Edict, provision VII.789.2

name: Gobbling Ooze
oracle_text: {G}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Gobbling Ooze.
flavor_text: The furious citizens blamed the Simic for releasing it in their district. The Simic pointed out that rats were no longer a problem.

name: Golgari Decoy
oracle_text: All creatures able to block Golgari Decoy do so.
Scavenge {3}{G}{G} ({3}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Horncaller's Chant
oracle_text: Put a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text: "The Selesnya are gathering armies. Do you still believe they aren't preparing for war?"—Teysa, to Isperia

name: Korozda Monitor
oracle_text: Trample
Scavenge {5}{G}{G} ({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Mana Bloom
oracle_text: Mana Bloom enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.
Remove a charge counter from Mana Bloom: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Mana Bloom has no charge counters on it, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Oak Street Innkeeper
oracle_text: As long as it's not your turn, tapped creatures you control have hexproof.
flavor_text: The city is vast and perilous, but there are places where a weary traveler can feel very much at home.

name: Rubbleback Rhino
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: The trouble started when a street urchin bet a goblin he could ride one until the clock on Shilbo's Tower struck thirteen.

name: Savage Surge
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
flavor_text: Gruul warriors never need to be stirred to battle. They need only to be shown where the battle is.

name: Seek the Horizon
oracle_text: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Raked by vertical spikes of glass and stone, Ravnica's vistas offer only a rare glimpse of the horizon.

name: Slime Molding
oracle_text: Put an X/X green Ooze creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Give me enough refuse and mana and I will summon an ooze that can engulf all of Ravnica."—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Stonefare Crocodile
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Stonefare Crocodile gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: The Izzet's plans to exploit the undercity ran into a few stubborn obstacles.

name: Towering Indrik
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It chases its airborne prey relentlessly, heedless to what it pulverizes beneath its hooves.

name: Urban Burgeoning
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "Untap this land during each other player's untap step."
flavor_text: The ruins of Old Prahv became a wildspace, although all birdsong was silenced by lingering Azorius magic.

name: Wild Beastmaster
oracle_text: Whenever Wild Beastmaster attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Wild Beastmaster's power.
flavor_text: "When they covered the world in city, all they did was give themselves nowhere to run."

name: Worldspine Wurm
oracle_text: Trample
When Worldspine Wurm dies, put three 5/5 green Wurm creature tokens with trample onto the battlefield.
When Worldspine Wurm is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

name: Abrupt Decay
oracle_text: Abrupt Decay can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Destroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.
flavor_text: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.

name: Archon of the Triumvirate
oracle_text: Flying

Whenever Archon of the Triumvirate attacks, detain up to two target nonland permanents your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

name: Armada Wurm
oracle_text: Trample
When Armada Wurm enters the battlefield, put a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: No one in the Conclave acts alone.

name: Auger Spree
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Azorius Charm
oracle_text: Choose one — Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn; or draw a card; or put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: "The rules of logic and order have already made the choice for you."—Isperia

name: Call of the Conclave
oracle_text: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

name: Carnival Hellsteed
oracle_text: First strike, haste
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Its favorite treats are candied hands and sweet hearts.

name: Centaur Healer
oracle_text: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

name: Chemister's Trick
oracle_text: Target creature you don't control gets -2/-0 until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.
Overload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Collective Blessing
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +3/+3.
flavor_text: Senators of Azorius often hired agents to spy on the Selesnya. They were told to record every spore and root they saw, as each could become a deadly foe.

name: Common Bond
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: Wolf riders hone their skills traversing the perilous rooftops, each dizzying step bringing elf and wolf closer together.

name: Corpsejack Menace
oracle_text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be placed on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are placed on it instead.
flavor_text: Weakness is not in the nature of the Swarm.

name: Counterflux
oracle_text: Counterflux can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Counter target spell you don't control.
Overload {1}{U}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

name: Coursers' Accord
oracle_text: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text: Bleak rumors reached Trostani's ears. She decreed that no one should travel alone.

name: Detention Sphere

When Detention Sphere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

name: Dramatic Rescue
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "I never thought I'd be so glad to see two tons of beak and claws bearing down on me at the speed of an arrow."—Mirela, Azorius hussar

name: Dreadbore
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: In Rakdos-controlled neighborhoods, everyone is part of the show.

name: Dreg Mangler
oracle_text: Haste
Scavenge {3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Epic Experiment
oracle_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each instant and sorcery card with converted mana cost X or less among them, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.

name: Essence Backlash
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Essence Backlash deals damage equal to that spell's power to its controller.
flavor_text: "The other guilds will learn the hard way not to interfere with our investigations."—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

name: Fall of the Gavel
oracle_text: Counter target spell. You gain 5 life.
flavor_text: "My ruling is final. Order is upheld. Justice is done."

name: Firemind's Foresight
oracle_text: Search your library for an instant card with converted mana cost 3, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then repeat this process for instant cards with converted mana costs 2 and 1. Then shuffle your library.

name: Goblin Electromancer
oracle_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

name: Golgari Charm
oracle_text: Choose one — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn; or destroy target enchantment; or regenerate each creature you control.
flavor_text: "Let the rest of Ravnica sneer. One way or another, they all end up in the undercity."—Jarad

name: Grisly Salvage
oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

name: Havoc Festival
oracle_text: Players can't gain life.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses half his or her life, rounded up.
flavor_text: "We can't control enemies who have no regard for their own survival."—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Hellhole Flailer
oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{2}{B}{R}, Sacrifice Hellhole Flailer: Hellhole Flailer deals damage equal to its power to target player.

name: Heroes' Reunion
oracle_text: Target player gains 7 life.
flavor_text: They share no bloodline, but a bond greater than family unites them. Such are the gifts of the Worldsoul.

name: Hussar Patrol
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Vigilance
flavor_text: "You think no one is watching, you think you're smart enough to escape, and most foolish of all, you think no one cares."—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Hypersonic Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, haste
You may cast sorcery cards as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)
flavor_text: "Even this primitive specimen of my kind is impressive."—Niv-Mizzet

name: Isperia, Supreme Judge
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "I serve only justice. But through that duty, I serve all of Ravnica."

name: Izzet Charm

name: Jarad's Orders
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two creature cards and reveal them. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Mercurial Chemister deals damage to target creature equal to the discarded card's converted mana cost.

Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{U}{R}: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Rakdos Charm

At the beginning of the draw step of enchanted creature's controller, that player draws an additional card.

name: Rites of Reaping

name: Rix Maadi Guildmage
oracle_text: {B}{R}: Target blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{B}{R}: Target player who lost life this turn loses 1 life.

name: Selesnya Charm

name: Skull Rend

oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Skymark Roc attacks, you may return target creature defending player controls with toughness 2 or less to its owner's hand.

oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Sphinx's Revelation
oracle_text: You gain X life and draw X cards.

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

name: Volatile Rig
oracle_text: Trample
Volatile Rig attacks each turn if able.
Whenever Volatile Rig is dealt damage, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Volatile Rig.
When Volatile Rig dies, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, it deals 4 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Azorius Guildgate
